--- In gladiator@y..., "dancing corpse" <dancing_corpse@h...> wrote:
> >My favorite team, of course, had 2 of most character types.
> 
> I don't see what you like about large teams. i see that it would be 
fun if 
> it actually worked. but it gets really annoying when your big 
investment's 
> get themselves killed by elves and you can do nothing tom stop it.

Simple: except for scenarios like 'Tic and Tac', that large team can 
win by shear numbers.

Of course, I stopped putting thieves on the team because they were 
more trouble than they're worth.
